title: How much do you get paid to be in a music video? - Quora

response.answer_text: How much do you get paid to be in a music video? The fish in this video claim they were paid NOTHING, at the time thinking it would be “fun” to be in a video. Now they are thinking twice about having been exploited, and are threatening to take legal action. Something to keep in mind, an instructive tale, even if a “fish tale/tail.” I guess you could say they were baited.  JA - No legal advice is intended.

I've worked a Bo Bice video for free after he did American idol . I worked NY 90's background videos that were $400 for the day And a Jennifer Lopez Video in the background for about $200 I am a Union member,so things have happily changed a bit in that area for the better. If it's passion-do it If it's pleasure-do it If you are needing the rent-ask what they pay or look at a casting notice. Dancers,features roles are going to get more fyi. Have fun.
